entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Bloons TD 5
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pile O' Monkey MoneyÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Pile O' Monkey MoneyÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Tower Unlock All UpgradesÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Bundle O' Monkey MoneyÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • 500 Monkey MoneyÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Vault O' TokensÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Double Cash ModeÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Vault O' Monkey MoneyÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Rank UpÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Bigger BeaconsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability. Now with rewarded leaderboards for even more fun and challenge! The Bloons are back and this time they mean business! Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool new Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon! Featuring 2 brand new Towers, cool Special Agents, glorious retina graphics, original Tracks and Special Missions, a whole new tier of Specialty Building upgrades, and the powerful Monkey Lab to further upgrade your towers, Bloons TD 5 delivers hours and hours of fun, challenging play to fans and new players alike. Hours and Hours of Awesome Gameplay: * 90+ Tracks * 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths * 10 Special Agents * Online Co-op play * Multi-track Odyssey Challenges * Boss Bloon Special Events * 10 Special Missions * 250+ Random Missions * Daily Challenges * New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrow Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG * 50+ Game Center Achievements and Challenges * iCloud Support * 3 different game modes * Freeplay mode after mastering a track * 4 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can play And that's just the beginning - regular planned updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons! Remember to save to iCloud after each victory or purchase to save your progress. iPad version also available - check out Bloons TD 5 HD for full screen UI awesomeness! https://ninjakiwi.com/terms

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Grand Agent: It Call
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫699,99

Application Description

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies. The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äãthe enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats. By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end. During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle. As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft. This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

entry.title: Stop&Get Away From Me! Defense
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫699,99

Application Description

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Y≈çkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

entry.title: Forest: Focus for Productivity
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫1.289,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫769,99 [‚Ç∫769,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.289,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Annual (Early Bird)Ôºö‚Ç∫769,99
  • Monthly (Early Bird)Ôºö‚Ç∫129,00
  • Bottle of Sunshine ElixirÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫769,99
  • Box of Sunshine ElixirÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Shovelful of CrystalÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Small pot of CrystalÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Large bag of CrystalÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Advanced Bonus PackÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Cartful of CrystalÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

Application Description

## Top productivity app in 136 countries. More than 2 million satisfied paying users. Featured in Apple's "Amazing Apps" TV commercial. ## Staying focused with the cutest gamified timer. ## Over 1,500,000 real trees were planted on Earth by our users. "Forest works well, and if your goal is to be more in the moment, ignore your phone and actually talk to your friends when you are with them, this is the app for you."‚Äî The New York Times "In order to establish new, better habits, it's helpful to engage with tools that make it easier to reinforce them. For anyone looking to curtail their phone usage, the Forest app might be for you."‚Äî Business Insider If you want to temporarily put down your phone and focus on what‚Äôs more important in real life, you can plant a seed in Forest. As time goes by, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither. The sense of achievement and responsibility will encourage you to stay away from your phone, and will help you make better use of your time. Stop getting distracted by your phone, make you self-motivated and get more things done. Stay focused, Be present! STAY FOCUSED ‚Ä¢ A interesting way to help you beat phone addiction and overcome distraction ‚Ä¢ Turn your focused moments into a lush forest. ‚Ä¢ Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. Non-allowed apps will be blocked. (iOS 16 or above) GET MOTIVATED ‚Ä¢ Earn rewards and unlock more than 90 new tree species and white noises. ‚Ä¢ Share your forest and compete with friends and users around the world. ‚Ä¢ Plant trees along with friends & family. ‚Ä¢ Unlock achievements and earn extra rewards. ‚Ä¢ Plant real trees on Earth and protect the environment with tree-planting organization Trees for the Future. STATISTICS ‚Ä¢ Manage your own tags and view detailed statistics of your time distribution. ‚Ä¢ Browse your weekly, monthly and even your yearly big forest. ‚Ä¢ Track your focused time in the Apple Health App. ‚Ä¢ Track your daily phone usage and screen time. ‚Ä¢ Recall memories of your planting journey with our brand new Forest Timeline! It's never too late to build up productive habits! NOTICE ‚Ä¢ Forest is compatible with iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch, and can be used across these iOS devices with a one-time purchase. The full app with the aforementioned features is available on iPhone and iPad; on Apple Watch you can view live planting session and today‚Äôs focus stats. To download or unlock a non-iOS version, it requires a separate purchase. By logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms. ‚Ä¢ Due to iOS limitations, the Allow List feature is only available on iOS/iPadOS 16 or above. If you‚Äôre using a device running iOS/iPadOS 15 or below, your tree will wither when you leave Forest during a planting session. ‚Ä¢ Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. We will be introducing limited time events that will allow users to plant more real trees. Please follow our social media page or check the in-app announcement for more updates. ‚Ä¢ There is only one version of Forest on the App Store. Other apps that are similar and mimics Forest are not developed by the Forest team. Thank you for your support! Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/ We also provide browser extensions. Find out more on www.forestapp.cc

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: CASE No: 1937
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫14,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

In-App Purchases

  • 10 CreditsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • 30 CreditsÔºö‚Ç∫79,99
  • 75 CreditsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Weekly PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Early AccessÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • 150 KrediÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Foggy streets, dark secrets, and a hidden story at every corner. Case No: 1937 is a choice-based detective game that immerses you in the magical yet dangerous atmosphere of the past. In this interactive experience, you step into the shoes of master detective Refik Bey and chase unsolved cases throughout Istanbul. Every decision alters the course of events. Sometimes a conversation with a suspect, other times a simple clue can lead you to a completely different ending. You can replay the same story in different ways, uncover hidden endings, and explore branching narratives to shed light on Istanbul‚Äôs shadowy history. Are you ready to solve your first case as Refik Bey?

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Pre registration bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Game EditorÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Chairman's PaymentÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Stop&Get Away From Me! Defense
entry.content:

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫699,99

Application Description

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Y≈çkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

entry.content:

All Price Information

  • 10 CreditsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • 30 CreditsÔºö‚Ç∫79,99
  • Weekly PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Early AccessÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • 75 CreditsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • 150 KrediÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Foggy streets, dark secrets, and a hidden story at every corner. Case No: 1937 is a choice-based detective game that immerses you in the magical yet dangerous atmosphere of the past. In this interactive experience, you step into the shoes of master detective Refik Bey and chase unsolved cases throughout Istanbul. Every decision alters the course of events. Sometimes a conversation with a suspect, other times a simple clue can lead you to a completely different ending. You can replay the same story in different ways, uncover hidden endings, and explore branching narratives to shed light on Istanbul‚Äôs shadowy history. Are you ready to solve your first case as Refik Bey?

entry.title: myLightMeter PRO
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫179,99 [‚Ç∫179,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

Designed by a photographer for photographers, focused on RELIABILITY and PRECISION for digital and analog photography. ‚Ä¢ Extended sensitivity as low as -2/-4EV (dark scenes) ‚Ä¢ Two different convenient interface designs. ‚Ä¢ Incident and reflected light metering modes. ‚Ä¢ Save exposure data. ‚Ä¢ f/Tools connection. ‚Ä¢ Independent calibration for the two metering modes. ‚Ä¢ Independent selection of aperture, speed, ISO and exposure compensation with 1/3 resolution. From 4 hours to 1/8000 sec., aperture from 1.0 to 512 and ISO from 0.8 to 6400. ‚Ä¢ Automatic priority for aperture or speed. (Automatic Av and Tv modes). ‚Ä¢ Automatic ISO or locked ISO options. ‚Ä¢ Point metering in camera view. ‚Ä¢ Maximum aperture limited by the selected lens. ‚Ä¢ Calculate the average of any number of measurements you want. ‚Ä¢ Read the exposure data of any photo from the gallery. ‚Ä¢ Calculate hyperfocal distance for 5 memorized lenses. Which also blocks maximum aperture. ‚Ä¢ Memory for 5 lenses with maximum aperture, focal length and film/sensor size for calculating hyperfocal distance and aperture. ‚Ä¢ Hyperfocal distance also for infrared light. (IR button) ‚Ä¢ Exposure value EV on an analog scale or right up front. ‚Ä¢ On 3.5 " displays preset lens buttons tilting the device or tapping at the bottom. ‚Ä¢ Be advised that accurate incident light reading needs a diffuser attached to the front camera. Without the diffuser still can be used but think about it, it will be a reflected reading taken with the front camera. I'm an independent photographer/designer/developer and am very grateful for your support. Trying to do the best lightmeter app ever, a lot more to come. You can ask for any improvement and I'll be happy to help. This app is constantly reviewed and improved because it is my tool, if you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact me by email at davidquiles@me.com Thank you! David Quiles

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: TuneIn¬†Radio: Music & Sports
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • TuneIn PremiumÔºö‚Ç∫209,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫65,99 [‚Ç∫65,99 ~ ‚Ç∫209,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

In-App Purchases

  • TuneIn PremiumÔºö‚Ç∫65,99
  • TuneIn Premium ProÔºö‚Ç∫699,99

Application Description

RADIO, YOUR WAY Listen to all the live news, sports, music, podcasts and radio you love, from around the world‚Äîall on the TuneIn app. TuneIn Pro is a special version of the TuneIn app that, for a one-time fee, removes visual display ads and pre-roll commercials that normally play before content begins. ALL YOUR AUDIO IN ONE APP. ‚Ä¢ News: Stay informed with 24/7 news from local, national, and global sources, including CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, NPR, and BBC. ‚Ä¢ Sports: Listen to live NFL, NHL, and college games, anywhere you go, plus local, national, and global sports talk stations. And, get instant gametime notifications and customized listening when you pick your teams on the app. ‚Ä¢ Music: Find tunes for any mood with exclusive music channels, including Today's Hits, Classic Rock Hits, and Country Roads. ‚Ä¢ Podcasts: Follow your passions and stream your favorite podcasts. ‚Ä¢ Radio: Stream your more than 100,000 AM, FM, and internet radio stations broadcasting from 197 countries. UNLOCK EVEN MORE WITH TUNEIN PREMIUM Sign up for the optional TuneIn Premium plan to hear: ‚Ä¢ Live Sports: Never miss a moment with live home radio broadcasts of every single NFL and NHL game, plus the biggest college football and basketball teams. ‚Ä¢ News with Fewer Ad Breaks: Keep up with breaking news with fewer ad breaks from CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio, MSNBC, and more. ‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free Music: Enjoy curated music stations, nonstop with no ads. ‚Ä¢ Fewer Ads: Hear 100,000+ radio stations with fewer ads and commercial breaks. WHAT YOU GET WITH THE TUNEIN APP 1. NEWS FROM ALL SIDES Experience live 24/7 news from CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, BBC, NPR, CNBC, and Cheddar, plus local stations like KQED-FM, WNYC-FM, KCRW, WHYY, WTMJ, and WAMU. Or get specific with news podcasts. 2. UNRIVALED LIVE SPORTS & SPORTS TALK Fuel your fandom with live play-by-play of NFL, NHL, and college football and basketball. Plus, hear news, analysis, and fan discussions from sports talk stations like ESPN Radio and talkSPORT. And, receive gametime notifications and customized content when you pick your favorite teams on the app. Plus, listen to podcasts covering your football, baseball, basketball, and hockey obsession from every angle. 3. MUSIC FOR EVERY MOOD Listen to the perfect music for every moment with TuneIn's exclusive, curated stations. Or listen to local stations and programs from the best AM/FM channels in the world. 4. PODCASTS FOR ANY PASSION From trending chart-toppers to niche favorites, follow shows like RadioLab, Stuff You Should Know, and TED Radio Hour, and top-rated hits like NPR's Up First, NYT's The Daily, Wow in the World, and more. 5. LISTEN WHEREVER YOU ARE In addition to the mobile and desktop app, TuneIn is available for free on hundreds of connected devices, including Apple Watch, CarPlay, Google Home, Amazon Echo and Alexa, Sonos, Bose, Roku, Chromecast, and more. Subscribe to TuneIn Radio Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings. Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/ Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies/ TuneIn uses Nielsen measurement software which allows you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. To learn more about Nielsen's products and your privacy, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: ‚óé I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. ‚óé Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. ‚óé It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. ‚óé Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. ‚óé I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. FeatureÔºö ‚óé Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category ‚óé iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen ‚óé Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data ‚óé Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates ‚óé Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster ‚óé Full gestures: fast billing basic ‚óé Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand ‚óé iCloud backup & restore ‚óé Dropbox backup & restore ‚óé Export data to CSV via Email ‚óé Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. ‚óé Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. ‚óé Allow add transaction from template. BasicÔºö ‚óé Expense & Income bills can be added photos ‚óé Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have ‚óé Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week ‚óé Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption ‚óé A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize ‚óé Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs ‚óé Supports iPhone & iPad ‚óé Daily reminder IncreaseÔºö ‚óé Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly ‚óé You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If „ÄÇ„ÄÇ„ÄÇ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usÔºösupport@daycost.com
